headline: Exro Technologies Inc. (EXROF) Reports Q4 Loss, Misses Revenue Estimates
summary: Exro Technologies Inc. (EXROF) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 0% and 40.37%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
